verses.verse: (A Maskil of Asaph.) Listen, <S%H238><s%> O my people, <S%H5971><s%> to my instruction; <S%H8451><s%> Incline <S%H5186><s%> your ears <S%H241><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
I will open <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> in a parable; <S%H4912><s%> I will utter <S%H5042><s%> dark <S%H2420><s%> sayings <S%H2420><s%> of old, <S%H6924><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> we have heard <S%H8085><s%> and known, <S%H3045><s%> And our fathers have told <S%H1><s%> us.

We will not conceal <S%H3582><s%> them from their children, <S%H1121><s%> But tell <S%H5608><s%> to the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And His strength <S%H5807><s%> and His wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works <S%H6381><s%> that He has done. <S%H6213><s%>

For He established <S%H6965><s%> a testimony <S%H5715><s%> in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> And appointed <S%H7760><s%> a law <S%H8451><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> He commanded <S%H6680><s%> our fathers, That they should teach <S%H1><s%> them to their children, <S%H3045><s%>

That the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%> might know, <S%H3045><s%> [even] the children <S%H1121><s%> [yet] to be born, <S%H3205><s%> [That] they may arise <S%H6965><s%> and tell <S%H5608><s%> [them] to their children, <S%H1121><s%>

That they should put <S%H7760><s%> their confidence <S%H3689><s%> in God, <S%H430><s%> And not forget <S%H7911><s%> the works <S%H4611><s%> of God, <S%H410><s%> But keep <S%H5341><s%> His commandments, <S%H4687><s%>

And not be like their fathers, A stubborn <S%H1><s%> and rebellious <S%H5637><s%> generation, <S%H4784><s%> A generation <S%H1755><s%> that did not prepare <S%H1755><s%> its heart, <S%H3559><s%> And whose spirit <S%H3820><s%> was not faithful <S%H7307><s%> to God. <S%H539><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> were archers <S%H9556><s%> equipped <S%H9349><s%> with bows, <S%H7198><s%> [Yet] they turned <S%H2015><s%> back <S%H2015><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle. <S%H7128><s%>
They did not keep <S%H8104><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> And refused <S%H3985><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in His law; <S%H8451><s%>
And they forgot <S%H7911><s%> His deeds, <S%H5949><s%> And His miracles <S%H6381><s%> that He had shown <S%H7200><s%> them.
He wrought <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> their fathers, In the land <S%H1><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> in the field <S%H4714><s%> of Zoan. <S%H7704><s%>

He divided <S%H1234><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and caused them to pass <S%H5674><s%> through; <S%H5674><s%> And He made the waters <S%H4325><s%> stand <S%H5324><s%> up like <S%H3644><s%> a heap. <S%H5067><s%>
Then He led <S%H5148><s%> them with the cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> with a light <S%H216><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

He split <S%H1234><s%> the rocks <S%H6697><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> And gave <S%H8248><s%> [them] abundant <S%H7227><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> like the ocean <S%H8415><s%> depths. <S%H8415><s%>
He brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> streams <S%H5140><s%> also from the rock, <S%H5553><s%> And caused waters <S%H4325><s%> to run <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> like rivers. <S%H5104><s%>
Yet they still <S%H5750><s%> continued <S%H3254><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> against Him, To rebel <S%H4784><s%> against the Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> in the desert. <S%H6723><s%>
And in their heart <S%H3824><s%> they put <S%H5254><s%> God <S%H410><s%> to the test <S%H5254><s%> By asking <S%H7592><s%> food <S%H3978><s%> according to their desire. <S%H5315><s%>
Then they spoke <S%H1696><s%> against God; <S%H430><s%> They said, <S%H559><s%> "Can <S%H3201><s%> God <S%H410><s%> prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>?

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> He struck <S%H5221><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> so that waters <S%H4325><s%> gushed <S%H2100><s%> out, And streams <S%H5158><s%> were overflowing; <S%H7857><s%> Can <S%H3201><s%> He give <S%H5414><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> also <S%H1571><s%>? Will He provide <S%H3559><s%> meat <S%H7607><s%> for His people <S%H5971><s%>?"

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> and was full <S%H9378><s%> of wrath, <S%H9378><s%> And a fire <S%H784><s%> was kindled <S%H9610><s%> against Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> And anger <S%H639><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> mounted <S%H5927><s%> against Israel; <S%H3478><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> they did not believe <S%H539><s%> in God, <S%H430><s%> And did not trust <S%H982><s%> in His salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
Yet He commanded <S%H6680><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> And opened <S%H6605><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of heaven; <S%H8064><s%>
And He rained <S%H4305><s%> down <S%H4305><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> upon them to eat, <S%H398><s%> And gave <S%H5414><s%> them food <S%H1715><s%> from heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
Man <S%H376><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of angels; <S%H47><s%> He sent <S%H7971><s%> them food <S%H6720><s%> in abundance. <S%H7648><s%>

He caused the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H6921><s%> to blow <S%H5265><s%> in the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> And by His power <S%H5797><s%> He directed <S%H5090><s%> the south <S%H8486><s%> wind. <S%H8486><s%>
When He rained <S%H4305><s%> meat <S%H7607><s%> upon them like the dust, <S%H6083><s%> Even winged <S%H3671><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> like the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the seas, <S%H3220><s%>
Then He let [them] fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of their camp, <S%H4264><s%> Round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> their dwellings. <S%H4908><s%>
So they ate <S%H398><s%> and were well <S%H3966><s%> filled; <S%H7646><s%> And their desire <S%H8378><s%> He gave <S%H935><s%> to them.
Before they had satisfied <S%H2114><s%> their desire, <S%H8378><s%> While <S%H5750><s%> their food <S%H400><s%> was in their mouths, <S%H6310><s%>

The anger <S%H639><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> rose <S%H5927><s%> against them, And killed <S%H2026><s%> some of their stoutest <S%H9304><s%> ones, And subdued <S%H3766><s%> the choice <S%H970><s%> men <S%H977><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
In spite of all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H384><s%> they still <S%H5750><s%> sinned, <S%H2398><s%> And did not believe <S%H539><s%> in His wonderful <S%H6381><s%> works. <S%H6381><s%>
So He brought <S%H3615><s%> their days <S%H3117><s%> to an end <S%H3615><s%> in futility, <S%H1892><s%> And their years <S%H8141><s%> in sudden <S%H928><s%> terror. <S%H928><s%>
When <S%H518><s%> He killed <S%H2026><s%> them, then they sought <S%H1875><s%> Him, And returned <S%H7725><s%> and searched <S%H7836><s%> diligently <S%H7836><s%> for God; <S%H410><s%>
And they remembered <S%H2142><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> was their rock, <S%H6697><s%> And the Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> God <S%H410><s%> their Redeemer. <S%H1350><s%>
But they deceived <S%H6601><s%> Him with their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And lied <S%H3576><s%> to Him with their tongue. <S%H3956><s%>
For their heart <S%H3820><s%> was not steadfast <S%H3559><s%> toward <S%H5973><s%> Him, Nor <S%H3808><s%> were they faithful <S%H539><s%> in His covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

But He, being compassionate, <S%H7349><s%> forgave <S%H3722><s%> [their] iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and did not destroy <S%H7843><s%> [them]; And often <S%H7235><s%> He restrained <S%H7725><s%> His anger, <S%H639><s%> And did not arouse <S%H5782><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His wrath. <S%H2534><s%>
Thus He remembered <S%H2142><s%> that they were but flesh, <S%H1320><s%> A wind <S%H7307><s%> that passes <S%H1980><s%> and does not return. <S%H7725><s%>
How <S%H4100><s%> often <S%H4100><s%> they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against Him in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> And grieved <S%H6087><s%> Him in the desert! <S%H3452><s%>
And again <S%H7725><s%> and again they tempted <S%H5254><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> And pained <S%H8428><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
They did not remember <S%H2142><s%> His power, <S%H3027><s%> The day <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H834><s%> He redeemed <S%H6299><s%> them from the adversary, <S%H6862><s%>
When <S%H834><s%> He performed <S%H7760><s%> His signs <S%H226><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And His marvels <S%H4159><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zoan, <S%H6814><s%>
And turned <S%H2015><s%> their rivers <S%H2975><s%> to blood, <S%H1818><s%> And their streams, <S%H5140><s%> they could not drink. <S%H8354><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> among them swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies, <S%H6157><s%> which devoured <S%H398><s%> them, And frogs <S%H6854><s%> which destroyed <S%H7843><s%> them.
He gave <S%H5414><s%> also their crops <S%H2981><s%> to the grasshopper, <S%H2625><s%> And the product <S%H3018><s%> of their labor <S%H3018><s%> to the locust. <S%H697><s%>
He destroyed <S%H2026><s%> their vines <S%H1612><s%> with hailstones, <S%H1259><s%> And their sycamore <S%H8256><s%> trees <S%H8256><s%> with frost. <S%H2602><s%>
He gave <S%H5462><s%> over <S%H5462><s%> their cattle <S%H1165><s%> also to the hailstones, <S%H1259><s%> And their herds <S%H4735><s%> to bolts <S%H7565><s%> of lightning. <S%H7565><s%>

He sent <S%H7971><s%> upon them His burning <S%H2740><s%> anger, <S%H639><s%> Fury, <S%H5678><s%> and indignation, <S%H2195><s%> and trouble, <S%H6869><s%> A band <S%H4917><s%> of destroying <S%H7451><s%> angels. <S%H4397><s%>

He leveled <S%H6424><s%> a path <S%H5410><s%> for His anger; <S%H639><s%> He did not spare <S%H2820><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> But gave <S%H5462><s%> over <S%H5462><s%> their life <S%H9130><s%> to the plague, <S%H1698><s%>
And smote <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the first-born <S%H7225><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> The first [issue] of their virility <S%H202><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of Ham. <S%H2526><s%>
But He led <S%H5265><s%> forth <S%H5265><s%> His own people <S%H5971><s%> like sheep, <S%H6629><s%> And guided <S%H5090><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> like a flock; <S%H5739><s%>
And He led <S%H5148><s%> them safely, <S%H983><s%> so that they did not fear; <S%H6342><s%> But the sea <S%H3220><s%> engulfed <S%H3680><s%> their enemies. <S%H340><s%>

So He brought <S%H935><s%> them to His holy <S%H6944><s%> land, <S%H1366><s%> To this <S%H2088><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> which His right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> had gained. <S%H7069><s%>

He also drove <S%H1644><s%> out the nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, And He apportioned <S%H5307><s%> them for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> by measurement, <S%H9112><s%> And made the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in their tents. <S%H168><s%>

Yet they tempted <S%H5254><s%> and rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H854><s%> the Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> And did not keep <S%H8104><s%> His testimonies, <S%H9381><s%>

But turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H5472><s%> and acted <S%H898><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> like their fathers; They turned <S%H1><s%> aside <S%H2015><s%> like a treacherous <S%H2015><s%> bow. <S%H7423><s%>
For they provoked <S%H3707><s%> Him with their high <S%H1116><s%> places, <S%H1116><s%> And aroused His jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with their graven <S%H6456><s%> images. <S%H6456><s%>
When God <S%H430><s%> heard, <S%H8085><s%> He was filled <S%H9378><s%> with wrath, <S%H9378><s%> And greatly <S%H3966><s%> abhorred <S%H3988><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%>
So that He abandoned <S%H5203><s%> the dwelling <S%H4908><s%> place <S%H4908><s%> at Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> The tent <S%H168><s%> which He had pitched <S%H7931><s%> among men, <S%H120><s%>
And gave <S%H5414><s%> up His strength <S%H5797><s%> to captivity, <S%H7628><s%> And His glory <S%H8597><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the adversary. <S%H6862><s%>
He also delivered <S%H5462><s%> His people <S%H5971><s%> to the sword, <S%H2719><s%> And was filled <S%H9378><s%> with wrath <S%H9378><s%> at His inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
Fire <S%H784><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> His young <S%H970><s%> men; <S%H970><s%> And His virgins <S%H1330><s%> had no <S%H3808><s%> wedding <S%H1984><s%> songs. <S%H1984><s%>
His priests <S%H3548><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> And His widows <S%H490><s%> could not weep. <S%H1058><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H136><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%> as [if from] sleep, <S%H3463><s%> Like a warrior <S%H1368><s%> overcome <S%H9548><s%> by wine. <S%H3196><s%>
And He drove <S%H5221><s%> His adversaries <S%H6862><s%> backward; <S%H268><s%> He put <S%H5414><s%> on them an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> reproach. <S%H2781><s%>
He also rejected <S%H3988><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> And did not choose <S%H977><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%>
But chose <S%H977><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He loved. <S%H157><s%>
And He built <S%H1129><s%> His sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> the heights, <S%H7311><s%> Like the earth <S%H776><s%> which He has founded <S%H3245><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
He also chose <S%H977><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> His servant, <S%H5650><s%> And took <S%H3947><s%> him from the sheepfolds <S%H6629><s%>; <S%H4356><s%>

From the care <S%H310><s%> of the ewes <S%H5763><s%> with suckling <S%H5763><s%> lambs <S%H5763><s%> He brought <S%H935><s%> him, To shepherd <S%H7462><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> His people, <S%H5971><s%> And Israel <S%H3478><s%> His inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
So he shepherded <S%H7462><s%> them according to the integrity <S%H8537><s%> of his heart, <S%H3824><s%> And guided <S%H5148><s%> them with his skillful <S%H8394><s%> hands. <S%H3709><s%>
